meanings.definition: A person who is imprisoned with others.
meanings.sent1: The coprisoners shared a small cell together.
meanings.sent2: The coprisoners were all locked up in the same jail.
meanings.sent3: The coprisoners joked about starting a band in prison.
meanings.sent4: Their bond as coprisoners was stronger than any metal bars.
meanings.sent5: The coprisoners relied on each other for support during their time behind bars.

meanings.definition: The act of being imprisoned with others.
meanings.sent1: The coprisonership brought them closer together.
meanings.sent2: The coprisonership was a challenging experience for all.
meanings.sent3: The coprisonership made for some interesting conversations in the cell.
meanings.sent4: Their coprisonership felt like a shared journey through darkness.
meanings.sent5: The coprisonership taught them the true meaning of camaraderie.
